00061 class Topology

00232     void setBox(const matrix &box, BoundaryCondition::eBoxtype boxtype=BoundaryCondition::typeAuto) {
00233         // determine box type automatically in case boxtype==typeAuto
00234         if(boxtype==BoundaryCondition::typeAuto) {
00235             boxtype = autoDetectBoxType(box);
00236         }
00237 
00238         if(_bc) {
00239             delete (_bc);
00240         }
00241         
00242         switch(boxtype) {
00243             case BoundaryCondition::typeTriclinic:
00244                 _bc = new TriclinicBox();
00245                 break;
00246             case BoundaryCondition::typeOrthorhombic:
00247                 _bc = new OrthorhombicBox();
00248                 break;
00249             default:
00250                 _bc = new OpenBox();
00251                 break;
00252         }
00253                
00254         _bc->setBox(box);
00255     };
00256 
00261     const matrix &getBox() {
00262         return _bc->getBox();
00263     };
00264     
00269     void setTime(double t) { _time = t; };
00270 
00275     double getTime() { return _time; };
00276     
00281     void setStep(int s) { _step = s; };
00282 
00287     int getStep() { return _step; };
00288 
00298     vec getDist(int bead1, int bead2) const;
00299

00310

00377 inline Bead *Topology::CreateBead(byte_t symmetry, string name, BeadType *type, int resnr, double m, double q)
00378 {
00379     
00380     Bead *b = new Bead(this, _beads.size(), type, symmetry, name, resnr, m, q);    
00381     _beads.push_back(b);
00382     return b;
00383 }
00384 
00385 inline Molecule *Topology::CreateMolecule(string name)
00386 {
00387     Molecule *mol = new Molecule(this, _molecules.size(), name);
00388     _molecules.push_back(mol);
00389     return mol;
00390 }
00391 
00392 inline Residue *Topology::CreateResidue(string name)
00393 {
00394     Residue *res = new Residue(this, _molecules.size(), name);
00395     _residues.push_back(res);
00396     return res;
00397 }
00398 
00399 inline Molecule *Topology::MoleculeByIndex(int index)
00400 {
00401     return _molecules[index];
00402 }
00403 
00404 inline void Topology::InsertExclusion(int i, list<int> l) {
00405     _exclusions.InsertExclusion(i,l);
00406 }
